metadata.title: CVE-2018-6197 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
w3m through 0.5.3 is prone to a NULL pointer dereference flaw informUpdateBuffer in form.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-6197` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

w3m - 0.5.3-26ubuntu0.2
w3m-img - 0.5.3-26ubuntu0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: w3m package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.5.3-26ubuntu0.2').
